column4: HI all my Prob: when i switch from user B to User A (after firstly switching from A to B) I got a black screen with mouse-Pointer but nothing else.. any suggestions?!
if you press alt+f2 and run: nautilus ,is the desktop drawn?
i dont think so.. there is no dialog shown.. but the mouse-pointer alters pointing over text-entry fields
i suppose that im not loged in already when i switch since i did not enter any Passwort but merely see the black screen with moveable Pointer
